title: Grade Improvement Strategies Through Enhanced Academic Activity Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental learning strategies and experience in academic design
context.additional_context: Project-based learning course conducted in smartphone-based real-time video lecture environments for graduate students in language fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the five principles of the IMESA model (intentionality, instructional design, learning design, interpersonal relationships, and evaluation system) and apply them to their academic activities.
Learners can diagnose factors influencing academic performance with 80% accuracy through analysis of academic activity awareness surveys.
Learners can establish personalized academic plans based on peer feedback and instructor coaching, and document execution results in project reports.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
